biotools.summary: Research bioinformatics system for inputting, validating, organizing, archiving, analyzing, and processing of complex clinical and genetic data. The database schema employs design principles for handling complex clinical information, such as response items in genetic questionnaires.

bioschemas.name: BiolAD-DB
